| The Chief Yeoman Warder:* has [a head, a couple of arms, and a torso](/wiki/Humanoid "Humanoid").
* is [omnivorous](/wiki/Omnivore "Omnivore").
* is not a valid [polymorphable](/wiki/Polymorph "Polymorph") form.
* is a [human](/wiki/Human_\(monster_attribute\) "Human (monster attribute)").
* is male.
* is normally generated [peaceful](/wiki/Peaceful "Peaceful").
* is [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong").
* can pick up weapons and food.
* can pick up [magical items](/wiki/Magical_item "Magical item").
* lets you close unless attacked. |                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |                                                                                                                  |

The **Chief Yeoman Warder**, @, is the [Yeoman](/wiki/Yeoman "Yeoman") [quest leader](/wiki/Quest_leader "Quest leader").

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Chief_Yeoman_Warder\&action=edit)*
html:
Chief Yeoman Warder

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
@ Chief Yeoman Warder
Difficulty 23
Attacks Weapon 1d6, Weapon 1d6
@ Chief Yeoman Warder
Difficulty 23
Attacks

Weapon 1d6, Weapon 1d6

Base level 20
Base experience 588
Speed 12
Base AC 0
Base MR 40
Alignment 20 (lawful)
Frequency (by normal means) Unique
Genocidable No
Weight 1450
Nutritional value 400
Size Medium
Resistances None
Resistances conveyed None

The Chief Yeoman Warder:

  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • is omnivorous.
  • is not a valid polymorphable form.
  • is a human.
  • is male.
  • is normally generated peaceful.
  • is strong.
  • can pick up weapons and food.
  • can pick up magical items.
  • lets you close unless attacked.
Reference SLASH'EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line5004

The Chief Yeoman Warder, @, is the Yeoman quest leader.

This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.
Retrieved from "https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Chief_Yeoman_Warder&oldid=131796"
